mapper.select: SELECT tsp.* FROM t_sys_permission tsp WHERE exists( select tsrp.id from t_sys_role_permission tsrp join t_sys_role tsr on tsrp.role_id = tsr.role_id join t_sys_user_role tsur on tsr.role_id = tsur.id join t_sys_user tsu on tsur.id = tsu.user_id where tsp.permission_id = tsrp.permission_id AND tsu.username = #{username} )
